column2: Ha ha! I knew it! So Jiants really [f2]can[/f] make themselves big or small whenever they want!
If I became a Jiant, could I make myself big or small too?
Aww, now I’ll never have a chance to become a Jiant.
Long ago, there were supposed to have been a lot of Jiants living here. Do you think that maybe one day, they’ll all come back?
